#include <iostream>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define upperlimit 1000010
using namespace std;
bool prime[upperlimit+1];
int primes[upperlimit+1];
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t,x1,x2;
	int i,j;
	for(i=2;i*i<=upperlimit;i++)if(!prime[i])for(j=i*i;j<=upperlimit;j+=i)prime[j]=true;
	for(i=2;i<=upperlimit;i++){
		if(!prime[i])primes[i]=primes[i-1]+1;
		else primes[i]=primes[i-1];
	}
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>x1>>x2;
		cout<<(primes[x2]-primes[x1-1])<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
